Issue.creator: JIRAUSER22092
Issue.summary: Vulnerability issues in jsrsasign package for fabric-sdk-node
Issue.description: When running the npm audit, we are noticing that there is critical RSA Signature validation vulnerability with the version of the jsrsasign package that is being used in the fabric-common, fabric-client and fabric-ca-client. According to the audit, the fix has been patched in version greater than 10.2.0. So this dependency needs to be updated
